projects.name: ShopNext
projects.description: The development of ShopNext, a Flipkart clone, from ideation to implementation. Utilized front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript and react.js to create an intuitive and user-friendly interface. Designed and implemented back-end functionalities using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for a seamless shopping experience. Integrated RESTful APIs to connect various components of the application and enable efficient data flow. Implemented JWT basic authentication for login/signup. Cloudinary is utilized to store and manage user data through its cloud-based media storage and delivery platform. Paytm is employed as the payment method, facilitating secure transactions and seamless financial interactions within the application. Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness, following UI/UX design principles. Implemented robust security measures, including SSL implementation and data encryption (SHA 256), to safeguard user information.

experiences.description: As a Web Developer at Oasis Infobyte, I contribute to the dynamic and innovative team responsible for creating robust and visually appealing web solutions. My role involves as Front-end Development for designing and implementing responsive web pages.
